Sure, here are a few other skincare products that are gentle and effective for combination skin:

1. Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser - This fragrance-free and non-comedogenic cleanser is perfect for combination skin. It doesn't strip the skin of its natural oils and effectively removes dirt, oil, and makeup. 2. The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% - This serum contains 10% niacinamide and 1% zinc, which help to regulate sebum production, reduce the appearance of enlarged pores, and improve skin texture. It's lightweight and non-greasy, making it suitable for combination skin. 3. La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer - This moisturizer is formulated with ceramides and shea butter to replenish and strengthen the skin barrier. It's non-greasy and absorbs quickly, making it perfect for combination skin. 4. Origins Original Skin Retexturizing Mask with Rose Clay - This gentle face mask contains rose clay, which helps to purify and exfoliate the skin. It also contains jojoba beads to gently buff away dead skin cells and refine skin texture, and willowherb to calm and soothe the skin. Remember, everyone's skin is different, so it's important to do a patch test before incorporating new products into your skincare routine. You should also listen to your skin and adjust your routine as needed based on its response.
